channel.title: Gallena News Feed
channel.description: The general news feed for Gallena University.

item.title: Summer BBQ
item.description: Gallena University Alumni and their families are invited to attend the annual Alumni Campus Fair and BBQ on November 18, 2020.
item.author: Rich Paul <rpaul@omniupdate.com>

media:content.media:title: Summer BBQ
media:content.media:description: Gallena University Alumni and their families are invited to attend the annual Alumni Campus Fair and BBQ on November 18, 2020.

item.title: Winter BBQ
item.description: Come join us
item.author: Rich Paul <rpaul@omniupdate.com>

item.title: Fall BBQ Festival
item.description: All Gallena Friends & Family are welcome to join us on campus October 27th for our annual Fall BBQ. This is a great new way to get to know Gallena University. We host all the food to give you the chance to get to know us.
item.author: Rich Paul <rpaul@omniupdate.com>

media:content.media:title: Fall BBQ Festival
media:content.media:description: All Gallena Friends & Family are welcome to join us on campus October 27th for our annual Fall BBQ. This is a great new way to get to know Gallena University. We host all the food to give you the chance to get to know us.

item.title: Campus Fair BBQ
item.description: Future Students and their families are invited to attend the annual Campus Fair on December 1.
item.author: Rich Paul <rpaul@omniupdate.com>

media:content.media:title: Campus Fair BBQ
media:content.media:description: Future Students and their families are invited to attend the annual Campus Fair on December 1.

item.title: Alumni Campus Fair
item.description: Gallena Alumni and their families are invited to attend the annual Alumni Campus Fair on January 1
item.author: automation

item.title: New Greek Fraternity
item.description: This fall, the Lambda Omicron Lambda fraternity joins the 12-chapter Interfraternity Council here at Gallena University.
item.author: automation

item.title: Winter Food Festival
item.description: All Gallena Friends & Family are welcome to join us on campus December 19th for our annual Winter BBQ. This is a great new way to get to know Gallena University. We host a spring food festival to give you the chance to get to know us.
item.author: automation

item.title: Women's Volleyball Wins Conference
item.description: The Lady Gophers fought with hand and foot to win the conference finals this weekend against Rocky Flats University Rebels, claiming their third championship in five years.
item.author: automation

item.title: Study Abroad Information
item.description: All Gallena friends and family are welcome to join us on campus for our annual semester abroad discussion.
item.author: automation

item.title: Free Food in Student Union
item.description: In preparation for finals, the Student Association of Gallena University is giving students a free meal in the Student Union.
item.author: automation

item.title: Surprise Concert in Student Union Next Month
item.description: The Student Association of Gallena University has announced a surprise concert for incoming students next month in the Student Union, but don't expect to find out who it is just yet.
item.author: automation

item.title: Baseball's Fritz Pitches No-Hitter on the Road
item.description: Ted Fritz's pitch-perfect no-hitter against the Redding College propelled the Gophers to first-place with a 4-0 final score.
item.author: automation

item.title: Gallena Gophers Take First Place!
item.description: Gallena University's men's 4-man rowing team recently took first place at the prestigious California Cup competition.
item.author: automation

item.title: New Greek Fraternity
item.description: This fall, the Lambda Omicron Lambda fraternity joins the 12-chapter Interfraternity Council here at Gallena University.
item.author: automation

item.title: Gallena Celebrates 80 Years
item.description: Gallena University celebrates 80 years of academic excellence. Gallena University is a private University which was founded in 1931.
item.author: automation

item.title: Art Faculty to Unveil New Exhibit
item.description: Four art professors have teamed up to unveil a new exhibit in the newly renovated downtown Gallena.
item.author: automation

item.title: First Place Gophers
item.description: Gallena University's men's 4-man rowing team recently took first place at the prestigious California Cup competition. The 2011 California Cup competition was held last week in the San Francisco Bay just north of the Golden Gate Bridge.
item.author: automation

item.title: Study Abroad Informational Meeting
item.description: All Gallena friends and family are welcome to join us on campus for our annual semester abroad discussion.
item.author: automation

item.description: In preparation for finals, the Student Association of Gallena University is giving students a free meal in the Student Union.
item.author: automation

item.description: The Student Association of Gallena University has announced a surprise concert for incoming students
